name: active-expressions-benchmark
description: Benchmarking the 3 implementation strategies of active-expressions

scripts.build-all: npm run build-baseline && npm run build-ticking && npm run build-rewriting && npm run build-rewriting-new && npm run build-interpretation
scripts.build-all-except-baseline: npm run build-ticking && npm run build-rewriting && npm run build-interpretation
scripts.build-rewriting: rollup -c benchmark/config/rollup.config.rewrite1.js && cd benchmark/temp/rewriting && babel rewriting_babel_in.js --out-file rewriting_babel_out.js && cd ../../.. && rollup -c benchmark/config/rollup.config.rewrite2.js
scripts.build-rewriting-new: rollup -c benchmark/config/rollup.config.rewrite-new1.js && cd benchmark/temp/rewriting-new && cd aexpr-transform-new && babel index.js  -d dist && cd .. && babel rewriting-new_babel_in.js --out-file rewriting-new_babel_out.js && cd ../../.. && rollup -c benchmark/config/rollup.config.rewrite-new2.js
scripts.build-interpretation: rollup -c benchmark/config/rollup.config.interpretation.js && cd benchmark/temp/interpretation && babel interpretation_babel_in.js --out-file interpretation_babel_out.js && cd ../../.. && rollup -c benchmark/config/rollup.config.interpretation2.js
scripts.multiple-benchs: for /l %x in (1, 1, 100) do (karma start --single-run && cd results && copy latest.json latest%x.json && cd ..)

author: stefan.ramson
